story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - AMAZON.COM INC. (AMZN.O) Current Prior Rating Sell Hold Price target $34 $35 --Citigroup said Amazon's current valuation implies a level of operating margin expansion that is not attainable. --The brokerage said it expects the Amazon's operating margins to expand in the near term as it cuts back on research and development spend but sees long-term GAAP operating margins capped in the 6 percent range rather than the 7 percent range implied by current valuation. --Citigroup said it sees the company's margin cap being driven by rising online advertising costs, gross margin pressure due to the shift from higher margin media sales and aggressive pricing and shipping promotions requirements due to increased competition, among other factors. --Shares of the company were down more than 2 percent at $38.49 in morning trade on the Nasdaq. (Reporting by Tenzin Pema in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - citigroup cuts amazon to sell
